location.title: Welcome to UBS! First choose location of waste disposal. Currently we work only in Kyiv and selected cities.
location.info-city: The city of Kyiv also includes Gatne, Gorenka, Zazymie, Irpin, Knyazhychi, Kotsyubynske, Novosilky, Petropavlivska Borshchahivka, Pohreby, Prolisky, Sofiivska Borshchahivka, Chayky, and Shchaslyve.
location.info-region: Currently, the Kyiv region includes cities within 20 km of Kyiv

extra-packages-pop-up.title: Extra packages
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-start: In addition to packages, UBS Courier can
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-end: pick up some extra items of recyclables for recycling free of charge:
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-second: number of UBS extras to the Courier, provided that you meet the following simple conditions:
extra-packages-pop-up.aluminum: aluminum cans (put in a separate bag / bag and tie);
extra-packages-pop-up.metal: household metal (always tears plastic bags, so it is better to give it in a bag / box);
extra-packages-pop-up.bottles: PET bottles are transparent from under drinks (put in a separate bag / bag and tie);
extra-packages-pop-up.cardboard: corrugated cardboard (separate the tape, stickers and all metal staples, and to make it easy to transport - fold it so that it was flat);
extra-packages-pop-up.polyfoam: polyfoam (only if the volume of the package does not exceed 120 l / for 1 export).
extra-packages-pop-up.condition1: When ordering the service, indicate that you plan to give the Courier free items, as well as their volume.
extra-packages-pop-up.condition2: Fold each type of packaging separately. And if, for example, you only have one frying pan, just give it to the Courier separately.

personal-info.info-no-address: You have no addresses added. Please add an address.
personal-info.info-coment-placeholder: Any details you would like to tell us further
personal-info.first-order: Please note: the courier picks up the packages at the entrance, does not go upstairs

submit-order.after-payment: After placing an order, you can make the payment in the chosen way

confirm-page.order-not-paid: Sorry, your order was not paid for. Please try again.
confirm-page.description: Thank you for your waste control!
confirm-page.questions: If you have any questions, you can

header.caption: It's even easier than before!
header.content: If you want to take care about our environment and get rid of your wastes, but you are extremely busy and can't get to the sorting station? UBS Courier will come to take your recyclable materials! We provide emergency garbage assistance

ubs-courier.info-header: The UBS Courier service will save your time and money for getting to the sorting station. And as a bonus, you will receive a free delivery of our eco-products around Kyiv.

content.li_1: check out our Rules of sorting wastes (link).
content.li_2: Everything you give to the Courier must be clean and dry – it’s Must Have.
content.li_3: Recyclables and non-recyclable plastics can be put together in one package /sack of a 120 liters size - we will re-sort everything.
content.li_4: We are accepting Fabric wastes (damaged clothes) for the utilization in a separate package of 120L size or 120L size
content.li_5: 1 package/sack should be up to 30 kg.
content.li_6: If you don't have a package/sack of the necessary size you can get it right from the Courier or order a whole roll of packages in our store and pack the wastes beforehand so you will save a big amount of time.
content.li_7: The courier picks up at least 2 packages within Kyiv.  Driving a long distance to take only 1 package is not environmentally friendly, and it significantly increases the waiting time for each customer. If you live within a radius of 20 km from Kyiv - the Courier takes out 20 packages of 120 liters.
content.li_8: The courier picks up the packages at the main entrance. You can also leave your packages at the concierge, the security post or any other places where the Courier can easily pick them up.

rules.caption: The necessary rule for picking up damaged clothes

content.li_1: We are taking only rags (clothes, shoes, bags, soft toys, bed linen and towels) for incineration, clothes which are completely unsuitable for wearing. If those clothes can still be useful for someone, please, give them to the people who need them.
content.li_2: Large metal parts must be removed from the clothing, and small ones can be left if they are part of it (for example, small zips, buttons, etc.)!
content.li_3: Be sure to remove all metal parts and batteries from the stuffed toys!

price.caption: The cost of the service “UBS Courier

price-description.li_1: with recycled materials and illiquid plastics with a volume of 120 L size.
price-description.li_2: with textile waste of 120 L size.
price-description.li_3: with textile waste of 20 L size.

steps-title.li_2: Order and pay for the service

steps-content.li_1: Create your personal account, where the history of your orders will be stored.
steps-content.li_2: Preparation of the route will take from 2 to 9 days.
steps-content.li_3: If you can not be on site at the agreed time, then leave the packages at the concierge, but be sure to pre-Courier.
steps-content.li_4: Keep track of your order history.

time.pre_2: Courier waiting time is 2 to 9 business days.

content.pre_1: Along with the export of recycled materials, you can also order eco-goods from our NO WASTE Shop.
content.pre_2: Delivery of goods is free of charge for UBS Courier customers.

sign-up.user-name-size: The name must contain 6-30 characters and can contain letters(a-z), numbers(0-9) and a dot(.), dot at the start, at the end and consecutive dot is forbidden

sign-up.password-symbols-error: Password has contain at least one character of Uppercase letter (A-Z), Lowercase letter (a-z), Digit (0-9), Special character (~`!@#$%^&*()+=_-{}[]|:;”’?/<>,.)
